event.title: winter of 1799, a small party of Indians, led

data.event: In the winter of 1799, a small party of Indians, led by their chief, Captain Susap, joined the colonists at Troy, built their camps on the river and wintered near them.

event.title: was found dead on Mount white Cap, in East Andover, Maine, in 1817

data.event: She was found dead on Mount white Cap, in East Andover, Maine, in 1817, having died, it is believed, at an age of 140 years.
